text:
Please join us for the PDX Web + Design Meetup  Thursday (tonight!) at 7pm.
Billy Jacks and Sam Jeibmann, interaction designers from Ziba, will talk about wins, failures, and lessons learned in their experiences with rapid prototyping.
 
TIME: 7pm (doors open at 6:15 for networking)
DATE: Thursday, June 11th
PLACE: AppNexus (711 SW Alder St, 4th floor)
DETAILS:  <http://www.meetup.com/pdxweb/events/222926687/>
 
Pizza, salad and drinks will be available. Please share this invitation with your friends and colleagues.
Hope to see you there!

attachments.title: PDX Web & Design
attachments.text: Functioning prototypes are tremendously valuable in conveying intent and design direction quickly. Without them, itâ€™s easy to let an undefined scope, feature misalignment, or blurry goals turn develop
